title: Revolution and coup difference, impact of coup

content.question: Describe one major difference between a revolution and a coup d’état. Identify a country in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course where there have been several successful coups d’état in the past 50 years. Describe a political consequence of the coups d’état in the country you identified.

frqParts.text: Describe one major difference between a revolution and a coup d’état. Identify a country in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course where there have been several successful coups d’état in the past 50 years. Describe a political consequence of the coups d’état in the country you identified.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
